game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has lost all meaning, players take on the role of a Chronomancer who must navigate through a realm torn apart by conflicting timelines. As they journey through forgotten eras and alternate realities, they must unravel the mysteries behind the Time Reavers' assault on the timestream.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate landscape known as the Timeless Wastes, where fragments of disparate timelines converge. Players awaken with no memory of who they are or how they arrived there, but are drawn to a glowing artifact known as the Echokeeper – a device that can manipulate temporal energies.
game.ending: Through their quest to defeat the Time Reavers and restore balance to the timestream, players discover that their existence is tied to the fabric of time itself. Depending on their choices throughout the game, they may either become the saviors of eternity or its greatest destroyers.
